name: TriggerBlock
description:
In This Game You Play As A Block In A Pixelated Environment! You Can Jump And Double Jump, And You Need To Get To The Golden Temple To Proceed To The Next Level! Every Level Is Possible And I Have Tested Them Before Release! You Just Have To Think Out Of The Box!

Remember That This Is An Early Access Game, And It Is Therefor Very Short!

This Is Also My First Game So Don't Be Too Harsh ;)
